ISSUE.TITLE: Don't Play Around. An Error just popped in! Sequence index out of range.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: i got this error when send [this](https://ufile.io/nc80n) apk file. -- > Don't Play Around. An Error just popped in! > Sequence index out of range. > > list index out of range -- Commandline output -- > [24/Dec/2017 18:14:58] "GET / HTTP/1.1" 200 7727 > [INFO] MIME Type: application/vnd.android.package-archive FILE: 16b280b277ecf84b71052b32cba488c8eb03e659f1b0ce38a46d22ddbdeb96ab.apk > > [INFO] Performing Static Analysis of Android APK > [24/Dec/2017 18:15:43] "POST /upload/ HTTP/1.1" 200 191 > [INFO] Starting Analysis on : 16b280b277ecf84b71052b32cba488c8eb03e659f1b0ce38a46d22ddbdeb96ab.apk > [INFO] Generating Hashes > [INFO] Unzipping > [INFO] Getting Hardcoded Certificates/Keystores > [INFO] APK Extracted > [INFO] Getting Manifest from Binary > [INFO] AXML -> XML > [INFO] Parsing AndroidManifest.xml > [INFO] Fetching icon path > [INFO] Extracting Manifest Data > [INFO] Manifest Analysis Started > [INFO] Static Android Binary Analysis Started > [INFO] Static Android Resourse Analysis Started > [INFO] Reading Code Signing Certificate > [INFO] APKiD Analysis on Dex file > [ERROR] list index out of range --

COMMIT.MESSAGE: APKiD no classes.dex error fix (#524) & Update APKiD rules * APKiD no classes.dex error fix Add a basic check for the existence of classes.dex file so that APKiD won’t crush. fix for issue #523 * Update APKiD rules Update APKiD rules file from rednaga’s repo - https://github.com/rednaga/APKiD

AVD android 6 update (#618) * APKiD no classes.dex error fix Add a basic check for the existence of classes.dex file so that APKiD won’t crush. fix for issue #523 * Update APKiD rules Update APKiD rules file from rednaga’s repo - https://github.com/rednaga/APKiD * New AVD emulator update * Major update to the AVD emulator - using snapshot feature instead of booting up the emulator each time * Some little aesthetic changes * Typo fix minor fix * fix small typo typo correction * Config check Minor config check * update settings remove my username + default add to none * Revert "update settings" This reverts commit 500da93ee64d7e18967c34d0b1d0579f5a38c5ad. * Revert "Merge remote-tracking branch 'MobSF/master'" This reverts commit e06dc749ce3f9a12edded3dc3fef1040acc10226, reversing changes made to 500da93ee64d7e18967c34d0b1d0579f5a38c5ad. * update settings.py remove username + default adb * Update start_avd.py correct error message ADB BINARY not AVD * start_avd update This is a new trick where I modify the system.omg.qcow2 file to fit the host OS * qcow2 wrapper + AVD update AVD emulator update - * Qcow2 script to manipulate the system image * some AVD runner changes * settings.py update update to match the new AVD version * Merge branch 'MobSF/master' # Conflicts: # requirements.txt * requirements fix
